thread.title: Intex launches Cloud V, priced at Rs 3,999
thread.title_full: Intex launches Cloud V, priced at Rs 3,999

title: Intex launches Cloud V, priced at Rs 3,999
text: Intex launches Cloud V, priced at Rs 3,999 TOI Tech | Sep 1, 2015, 05.19 PM IST Intex Cloud V is a dual-sim smartphone is powered by 1.2GHz quad-core Spreadtrum (SC7731) processor, comes with 512MB RAM and offers 8GB of internal storage. RELATED NEW DELHI: Intex has expanded its Cloud series with the addition of Cloud V. Intex Cloud V runs on Android 4.4.2 KitKat and features 5-inch (480x854p) FWVGA TFT display. The dual-sim smartphone is powered by 1.2GHz quad-core Spreadtrum (SC7731) processor, comes with 512MB RAM and offers 8GB of internal storage. Users can also install microSD cards of up to 32GB for more storage space. Intex Cloud V sports an 8MP primary camera with LED flash and a 2MP secondary camera and packs 2000mAh battery. For connectivity, the smartphone offers 3G, GPRS/EDGE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and a micro-USB slot. The smartphone is available online at Rs 3,999. General
